alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Dickenson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 1:31AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Dickenson, Buchanan, McDowell and southern Wyoming Counties through 200 AM EDT... At 130 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a broken line extending from 11 miles southeast of Argo to near Trammel. Movement was east-northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Welch, Grundy, Davenport, Mullens, Gary, War, Northfork, Trammel, Davy, Bradshaw, Iaeger, Keystone, Kimball, Jolo, Oakwood, Elbert, Coalwood, Avondale, Wolf Pen and McClure. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, seek shelter inside a building until the storms pass. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Charleston West Virginia.
